title: Annual General Meeting Announced
summary: The annual general meeting will be held on the 1st of September. All members are requested to attend.

title: Cultural Program Lineup
summary: We are excited to announce the lineup for this year's cultural program, featuring local artists and performers.

title: Volunteer Registration Open
summary: We are looking for volunteers to help with the upcoming puja preparations. Sign up now to be a part of the team.

title: Donation Drive for Charity
summary: Join our donation drive to support local charities. Your contribution can make a big difference.

title: Kids' Drawing Competition
summary: A drawing competition for children will be held on the second day of the puja. Prizes for all participants.

title: New Membership Plans
summary: We have introduced new membership plans with more benefits. Check out the subscription page for details.
